meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Tell</kanji> everyone how you <kanji>describe</kanji> your<kanji>self</kanji> in your <vocabulary>autobiography</vocabulary>. It's the only way they'll be able to understand the real you.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
